message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. How about a 55/45 split?
I can do 58-42, it's a better deal for you than my first offer.
We're running out of time. I need a bigger share to account for inflation, let's settle for 52/48.
Inflation is hitting you hard, I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 57-43.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation.  51/49 is my final offer.
You said 51/49 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll stick with 56-44.
